title: INNOVATION FUND
description: This scheme is designed to support innovations and startups that have a unique idea to improve society and the economy.

description: For startups and organizations looking to scale their operations and expand to new markets.

description: This grant supports early-stage technology startups by providing them with the necessary financial support and resources to launch.

description: A fellowship program that offers mentorship and financial support to young entrepreneurs with innovative ideas.

description: This initiative promotes environmentally sustainable practices in various industries and supports green technologies.

description: This fund supports initiatives that focus on social impact and aim to solve pressing societal challenges.

description: Supports the transfer of advanced technologies from research institutions to commercial industries for mass implementation.
